downtown-office-renovation.title: Downtown Office Tower Renovation
downtown-office-renovation.challenge: Modernize a 15-story office building's interior while maintaining daily operations with 200+ employees.
downtown-office-renovation.solution: Implemented a phased, after-hours approach using low-VOC materials for occupied spaces.
results: 30% reduction in energy costs with new coatings

testimonial.quote: Ascen Group transformed our workspace without missing a beat. Their after-hours team was professional, efficient, and the results exceeded our expectations.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson
testimonial.title: Facilities Manager, TechCorp Inc.

downtown-office-renovation.details: This comprehensive renovation included painting all common areas, conference rooms, and private offices across 15 floors. The project required careful coordination with building management to minimize tenant disruption.

luxury-condo-restoration.title: Luxury Waterfront Condo Complex
luxury-condo-restoration.challenge: Restore exterior stucco and EIFS on a 25-year-old luxury condominium complex while residents remained in their homes.
luxury-condo-restoration.solution: Developed a unit-by-unit schedule with resident coordination and implemented complete weatherproofing during work.
results: Extended building envelope life by 20+ years

testimonial.quote: The team was respectful of our residents and maintained excellent communication throughout. The building looks brand new.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen
testimonial.title: Condo Board President

luxury-condo-restoration.details: The project involved repairing and refinishing all exterior stucco and EIFS surfaces, addressing water damage, and implementing a new weather barrier system.

heritage-building-restoration.title: Heritage Building Facade Restoration
heritage-building-restoration.challenge: Restoring a 1920s heritage building's original stucco facade while meeting modern building codes and preservation guidelines.
heritage-building-restoration.solution: Matched original materials and techniques with modern weatherproofing technology, working closely with heritage consultants.

testimonial.quote: Ascen Group's expertise in heritage restoration was evident. They preserved the building's character while ensuring it meets today's standards.
testimonial.author: Patricia Williams
testimonial.title: Heritage Architect

heritage-building-restoration.details: Original stucco samples were analyzed in a lab to match composition. Custom pigments were mixed to achieve the exact original color.

underground-parking-restoration.title: Underground Parking Garage Restoration
underground-parking-restoration.challenge: Restore a deteriorating 30-year-old underground parking garage with severe concrete spalling and coating failure while maintaining partial operations.
underground-parking-restoration.solution: Implemented a phased approach with temporary parking solutions, applied advanced epoxy repair systems, and installed high-performance traffic coatings.
results: Improved lighting by 40% with reflective coatings

testimonial.quote: The transformation is remarkable. What was once a dark, deteriorating space is now bright, safe, and protected for decades to come.
testimonial.author: David Kumar
testimonial.title: Building Operations Manager

underground-parking-restoration.details: The project involved concrete repair, waterproofing, installation of traffic-rated polyurethane coatings, and line striping across three underground levels.

high-rise-balcony-restoration.title: High-Rise Balcony Restoration Project
high-rise-balcony-restoration.challenge: Repair and refinish 200 balconies across a 30-story residential tower with water damage, concrete deterioration, and coating failure.
high-rise-balcony-restoration.solution: Coordinated with residents for access, implemented comprehensive concrete repairs, applied waterproof membrane systems, and installed decorative coatings.

testimonial.quote: Ascen Group's team was professional and respectful. Our balcony looks brand new and we finally have confidence it won't leak.
testimonial.author: Jennifer Park
testimonial.title: Resident

high-rise-balcony-restoration.details: Each balcony received structural assessment, concrete repair, crack injection, waterproof membrane installation, and a final decorative coating system.

retail-plaza-transformation.title: Retail Plaza Exterior Transformation
retail-plaza-transformation.challenge: Modernize a dated 1980s retail plaza exterior to attract new tenants while keeping all existing stores operational during the work.
retail-plaza-transformation.solution: Complete facade makeover with new EIFS system, accent metal panels, modern color scheme, and enhanced architectural details.

testimonial.quote: The transformation exceeded our expectations. What was once an eyesore is now the premier retail destination in the area.
testimonial.author: Robert Chang
testimonial.title: Property Owner

retail-plaza-transformation.details: The project included removal of old stucco, installation of new insulated EIFS system, decorative metal cladding accents, new signage, and comprehensive painting.

school-interior-renovation.title: Elementary School Interior Renovation
school-interior-renovation.challenge: Refresh a 40-year-old elementary school interior during summer break with strict safety and schedule requirements.
school-interior-renovation.solution: Used zero-VOC paints, implemented accelerated schedule, coordinated with school board specifications, and ensured completion before school year.
results: Positive feedback from teachers and parents
No odors or air quality issues on opening day

testimonial.quote: The school looks amazing and was ready right on time. The team worked with incredible efficiency and respect for our facility.
testimonial.author: Linda Martinez
testimonial.title: School Principal

school-interior-renovation.details: Painted all classrooms, hallways, gymnasium, cafeteria, and administrative offices using low-VOC materials. Included decorative murals in common areas.

industrial-warehouse-coating.title: Industrial Warehouse Floor Coating
industrial-warehouse-coating.challenge: Install a high-performance floor coating system in an active distribution warehouse without shutting down operations.
industrial-warehouse-coating.solution: Worked overnight shifts in sections, used fast-cure epoxy systems, and coordinated closely with warehouse operations to maintain workflow.
results: Floor ready for traffic in 24 hours per section

testimonial.quote: Amazing coordination and execution. We never stopped operations and now have a floor that's easier to clean and maintain.
testimonial.author: Thomas Anderson
testimonial.title: Warehouse Manager

industrial-warehouse-coating.details: Applied industrial-grade epoxy coating system with chemical resistance, anti-slip additives, and high-durability topcoat. Included line striping and safety markings.
